title: enagondu mAtu
sahitya:
enegondu mAtu hELade hOde hamsa


anupallavi

  tanuvinoLage anudinaviddu


caraNam 1    jvAlAdharavembo mALige maneyalli I hOdu ombattu bAgila 
kALi bandu kuTTi ele hAri hOguvAga bErige hELi hOyite ondu mAta
    caraNam 2    Eriyu nIra koNDiddante nA ninna taDakoNDiddenalla 
bhOrendu maLeyu harideddu hOguvAga ErighELi hOyite ondu mAta
    caraNam 3    nAnA beTTagaLalli iTTANi phaNiyalli ikkitu jEnu tanna sukhakAgi 
jEnu tuppavanuNdu noNa hAri hOguvAga hippeghELi hOyide ondu mAta
    caraNam 4    rasa bhArata kOTi hamsa tAnoDe gUDi pesaru pELuvano anudinavu 
rasa bhOjanavuNDu jyOti tA hOguvAga praNatighELi hOyite ondu mAta
    caraNam 5    sarpa shayananADida mAtu husiyalla phaNiyakSarada mEle koDalilla 
cappANi muttu bAyi bicci hOguvAga dukkha bEDa purandara viTTala
